description: Size stories appropriately for effective planning and delivery. Stories should represent complete, testable work that can be developed in days (3-12 days typical). Maintain hierarchy within cognitive limits (4-9 items per level is optimal).

do.description: Size stories for days, not weeks; maintain reasonable hierarchy
content: Stories sized for 3-12 days of effort (3-5 days optimal)
Each story is complete and independently testable
Sub-epics typically contain 4-9 stories (cognitive limit guideline)
Stories represent complete flows, not arbitrary decomposition
Don't create stories spanning multiple weeks (too large)
Don't artificially pad to hit story counts (quality over quantity)
Don't create stories that can't be tested independently
Don't ignore sizing - but use as guidance, not rigid rules
